d: A FreeSewing pattern for a baby romper

s.bindingNeckBack.t: The Back Neck Binding is not shown
s.bindingNeckBack.d: The **Back Neck Binding** is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.bindingNeckFront.t: The Front Neck Binding is not shown
s.bindingNeckFront.d: The **Front Neck Binding** is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.bindingLeg.t: The Leg Binding is not shown
s.bindingLeg.d: The **Leg Binding** is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.

binding.d: Binding determines the size of the binding for the neck and leg openings.

ease.d: The ease is a percentage of the waist measurement. Default is 14%

hem.d: Hem determines the size of the hem on the sleeves.

sleeveType.d: Otis can be made with short or long sleeves.

snapPlacket.d: This option controls the depth of the placket that holds the snaps.
